com.netflix.governator

Interface LifecycleListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultLifecycleListener, JettyModule.JettyShutdown, LifecycleModule.LifecycleProvisionListener, LoggingProvisionMetricsLifecycleListener

    public interface LifecycleListener
    Listener for Injector lifecycle events. LifecycleListener should be reserved for framework use only. All application shutdown code should use @PreDestroy, which is triggered via a LifecycleListener enabled by installing LifecycleModule. When writing a LifecycleListener that is managed by Guice, make sure to inject all dependencies lazily using Provider injection. Otherwise, these dependencies will be instantiated too early thereby bypassing lifecycle features in LifecycleModule.
    Author:
    elandau

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onStarted()
      Notification that the Injector has been created.
      void onStartFailed(java.lang.Throwable t)
      Notification that the Injector failed to be created.
      void onStopped()
      Notification that the injector is shutting down

    • Method Detail

      • onStarted

        void onStarted()

      • onStopped

        void onStopped()
        Notification that the injector is shutting down

      • onStartFailed

        void onStartFailed(java.lang.Throwable t)
        Notification that the Injector failed to be created. This will only be called for LifecycleListeners registered with LifecycleManager before the injector is created
